#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{  int n,count1=0,count2=0,count3=0,count5=0;
   cin>>n;
   while(n>=5)
   {  n=n-5;
      count5++;
   }
   while(n>=3)
   {  n=n-3;
      count3++;
   }
   while(n>=2)
   {  n=n-2;
      count2++;
   }
   while(n>=1)
   {  n=n-1;
      count1++;
   }
   cout<<count5<<endl<<count3<<endl<<count2<<endl<<count1<<endl;      
   return 0;
}
